variable.name: FS064
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (USE HIGHEST LEVEL OF DEPENDENCE): DRESSING (UNDRESSING AND REDRESSING)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FS065
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (USE HIGHEST LEVEL OF DEPENDENCE): BATHING (INCLUDING GETTING IN AND OUT OF THE TUB OR SHOWER)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE (USE HIGHEST LEVEL OF DEPENDENCE): EATING
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.value: 0 MINUTES OR NO CEREBROVASCULAR EVENT IN THE INTERIM

variable.value: NO OR NO CEREBROVASCULAR EVENT IN THE INTERIM

variable.value: 0 DAYS STAYED OR NO CEREBROVASCULAR EVENT IN THE INTERIM

variable.description: DO YOU HAVE LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING?

variable.name: FS422
variable.description: IF WALKING ON LEVEL GROUND, HOW MANY CITY BLOCKS UNTIL SYMPTOMS DEVELOP? (WHERE 10 BLOCKS = 1 MILE, CODE AS NO IF MORE THAN 98 BLOCKS REQUIRED TO DEVELOP SYMPTOMS)
variable.value: NO SYMPTOMS OR ZERO BLOCKS UNTIL SYMPTOMS DEVELOP

variable.name: FS424
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN LEFT CALF WHILE WALKING

variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN RIGHT CALF WHILE WALKING

variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN LOWER RIGHT EXTREMITY (NOT CALF) WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FS428
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: OCCURS WITH FIRST STEPS
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FS429
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: OCCURS AFTER WALKING A WHILE
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FS430
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: RELATED TO RAPIDITY OF WALKING OR STEEPNESS
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FS431
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: FORCED TO STOP WALKING
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FS432
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: TIME FOR DISCOMFORT TO BE RELIEVED BY STOPPING (MINUTES)
variable.value: NO RELIEF WITH STOPPING OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FS433
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: NUMBER OF DAYS/MONTH OF LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT
variable.value: NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING
